creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Koji Wada
description: blue-gray background with embroidered autumn maple leaf motif throughout; other brightly colored, ornately embroidered designs including bridges, ducks, turtles, crests, and patterns
markings: tag at collar with manufacturer, on opposite, in pen: [100% silk / Hand embroidered /uchikake own / $4,500.00]
title: Wedding robe (uchikake) with design of standing curtains, maple trees, and large drum
